title: Unable to purchase the paragon and the rogue set

embed.description: Imgur: The most awesome images on the Internet.

body: I have enough RP for the lancer zero set, it says that its 1820 RP and I have 2334 but the option to buy it is still greyed out. I have restarted the client.

replies.body: Hey there, you need click on the checkbox confirming you'd like to purchase the bundle.  That should make the unlock available!
I was unaware of this, worked fine though tyvm porocles
